name: mcp-package-version
description: An MCP server to provide LLMs the latest (stable) version of packages in package.json and requirements.txt files

scripts.bump: npx -y standard-version --skip.tag && git add . ; git commit -m 'chore: bump version' ; git push
scripts.postinstall: echo '[33m**NOTE: As of version 2.0.0, this MCP server will be rewritten in Go, once released please visit https://github.com/sammcj/mcp-package-version for information on the updated command for your MCP client**[0m'
